title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         Bronze lion on top of the Memorial   News For the latest news and news releases.   Photos & Multimedia  If you want to see old pictures of the building of the Memorial or pictures from special events you need to check out this section.    History & Culture  This is the section if you want to learn about the War of 1812, Battle of Lake Erie, the men and women that help to fight the battle of lake, and the history of the Memorial.     Nature Although Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial was established and preserved for historical reasons it is located on an island in Lake Erie and thus surrounded by nature and we cannot escape that.   Education If you are a teacher looking for resources or planning a trip to the Memorial you should head here.   Kids & Youth This section has information for kids want to learn about the memorial and the War of 1812. This section also has information for scouts and the Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial and Great Lakes Junior Ranger booklet.   Management  Review items relating to the Management of the Park, including Laws & Policies and more.
